    Projects & Apps

    PJB Sports Data

    A data engineering project to pull sports data from a variety of sources into a data warehouse for efficient querying and analysis.

    data engineering cloud computing data warehousing

    Canadians in College Baseball

    How many Canadians are playing college baseball? What are these players’ stats? The CBN can tell you because of a web-scraping project I began in 2021.

    college baseball web scraping baseball statistics

    Beat the Streak Shiny App

    A Shiny for Python web app to make better predictions in MLB’s Beat the Streak contest.

    sabermetrics statcast predictive analytics web development

    Fort Worth Men’s Senior Baseball League Website

    I built a new website for a men’s baseball league I play in. The site utilizes Flask, Bootstrap and the Google Sheets API among other technologies.

    web development
